PositionHistory.Title: lead developer
business applications
PositionHistory.Description:
Project: FLEXCUBE SSI-MH
Tools & Technologies: Java, JSP, Struts, Java Script, JMS, PL/SQL, Oracle, VSS, WSAD, ANT.
Description: FLEXCUBE SSI-MH system provides for a delivery and data exchange channel over SWIFTNet. It acts as a single point of access for customer internal applications wanting to exchange data over SWIFTNet. FLEXCUBE SSI-MH decouples the internal business applications from the protocol level details of SWIFTNet and provides a common integration interface to any internal application. The applications can leverage the FileAct and InterAct and Browse services provided by SWIFTNet transparently. This also shields the internal applications from any changes to the SWIFTNet services or protocols. The applications User Interface provides for detailed Life Cycle Monitoring of the transactions being processed by the system and extensive reporting depicting the health and performance of the system, activity and entitlements of users.
Responsibilities:
* User Interface Development by using JSP, Java Script, Struts Framework, DAO Object and Oracle database. ; * Test case execution. * Bug fixing

PositionHistory.Title: developer

ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: This candidate has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 8 years. Currently this candidate is employed at Ally Financial Inc. This candidate has extensive knowledge of Java, XML, Oracle, Struts Web Application Framework, SQL, JavaScript, XSLT, Oracle PL/SQL, Java Server Pages, Enterprise Java Beans, ECLiPSe, XML Schema, SOAP, XSL, WebSphere Studio Application Developer, WebSphere MQ, Web Services, VSS, Jboss, Java Messaging Service, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Apache Maven, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, UNIX, UML/OMT, Microsoft Visio, JUnit, JNDI, HTML, Python Programming, Oracle Toad, Message-Driven Beans, Logic Works ERwin/ERX, JAXWS, Framework, Data Access Object, DAO Object, Class Diagrams, Cascading Style Sheets, CVS. So far this candidate has not gained any managerial experience.
